Discord Literature Club

The Discord Literature Club is a place to share your love for literature with likeminded people.

A few facts about the club:

  • Friendly, welcoming atmosphere for everyone
  • Many fun activities like the Daily Poem Challenge, music room and art room
  • Daily writing advice from everyone's favorite club president!
  • Mutual emotional support room where you can have a candid conversation, vent or ask for a life advice. Discord Literature Club won't leave you hanging!

Right now submissions are open. To sign up, DM me on Twitter.
